name: Blog
backend_requirements: 1. Post model: id, title (required), content (text), author, created_at, updated_at
2. CRUD endpoints: GET /api/posts (list), GET /api/posts/:id (single), POST, PUT, DELETE
frontend_requirements: 1. Post list showing title, excerpt (first 200 chars), date, author
2. Click post title to view full content
3. Create/edit post form with title and content textarea
